Name: MIYAMOTO S
About the game: MIYAMOTO is a single player card game with a miniature board. Game art is simple and oriental world with Samurai. Open the box of the board game and you will be dive into a world of miniatures! The important tactics is'when' and 'where' and 'which' play your card. Random deck on each battles will not promise their results, It's up to your tactics. Collect unique heroes and defeat MIYAMOTO. MIYAMOTO S includes the extended content 'Shiba Inu'. New units including 'Shiba Inu' have been added.
